name: typhonjs-escomplex
description: Next generation software complexity analysis of JavaScript-family abstract syntax trees.

scripts.build-syntax: babel ./node_modules/typhonjs-escomplex-project/src -d ./node_modules/typhonjs-escomplex-project/dist && babel ./node_modules/typhonjs-escomplex-module/src -d ./node_modules/typhonjs-escomplex-module/dist && babel ./node_modules/typhonjs-escomplex-commons/src -d ./node_modules/typhonjs-escomplex-commons/dist && babel ./node_modules/escomplex-plugin-metrics-project/src -d ./node_modules/escomplex-plugin-metrics-project/dist && babel ./node_modules/escomplex-plugin-metrics-module/src -d ./node_modules/escomplex-plugin-metrics-module/dist && babel ./node_modules/escomplex-plugin-syntax-estree/src -d ./node_modules/escomplex-plugin-syntax-estree/dist && babel ./node_modules/escomplex-plugin-syntax-babylon/src -d ./node_modules/escomplex-plugin-syntax-babylon/dist && babel ./node_modules/typhonjs-plugin-manager/src -d ./node_modules/typhonjs-plugin-manager/dist
